attributes.action: Halt tax rises and give us an election now
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We call upon the prime minister to stop robbing the workers of Britain to pay for his and the banks' incompetence and give the people of Britain the opportunity to say in how this crisis is dealt with by giving us an immediate general election

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
